mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.S_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.S_TITLE, A.S_CONTENT, A.S_CREATE_DATE, A.S_MODIFY_DATE, A.S_HIT, A.S_GENDER, A.S_REGION, A.S_WIDO, A.S_GDO, A.S_LANG, A.S_PEOPLE, A.S_CONTACT, A.S_DATE, A.S_IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, S_NO, NICKNAME, S_TITLE, S_CONTENT, S_CREATE_DATE, S_MODIFY_DATE, S_HIT, S_GENDER, S_REGION, S_WIDO, S_GDO, S_LANG, S_PEOPLE, S_CONTACT, S_DATE, S_IP FROM S_GROUP B) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT S_GROUP_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO S_GROUP (S_NO, NICKNAME, S_TITLE, S_CONTENT, S_CREATE_DATE, S_MODIFY_DATE, S_HIT, S_GENDER, S_REGION, S_WIDO, S_GDO, S_LANG, S_PEOPLE, S_CONTACT, S_DATE, S_IP) VALUES (#{SNo}, #{nickname}, #{STitle}, #{SContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{SGender}, #{SRegion}, #{SWido}, #{SGdo}, #{SLang}, #{SPeople}, #{SContact}, SYSDATE, #{SIp})
